member.name: P:Flame.Syntax.ITypeSyntax.IsVariable
member.summary: Gets if this type syntax represents a type that matches the type of the expression it's assigned to.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.SyntaxExtensions.GetSourceLocation(Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxNode)
member.summary: Tries to get the node's source location by checking its ancestry for an ISourceSyntax implementation. If the given node does not implement ISourceSyntax, null is returned.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.SyntaxExtensions.GetCallerExpression(Flame.Syntax.ITypeMemberAccessSyntax,Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxState)
member.summary: Gets an expression for the syntax that accesses the member. Returns null if the member is accessed statically.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.ITypeMemberAccessSyntax.GetCallerVariable(Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxState)
member.summary: Gets a variable for the syntax that accesses the member. Returns null if the member is accessed statically.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.ITypeMemberAccessSyntax.GetAccessedMembers(Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxState)
member.summary: Gets all type members that fit the syntax's description.

member.name: T:Flame.Syntax.IDocumentationParser
member.summary: Defines a common interface for objects that parse textual documentation and return description attributes.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.IDocumentationParser.Parse(System.String,Flame.Compiler.SourceLocation,Flame.Compiler.ICompilerLog)
member.summary: Parses the given textual documentation into description attributes.

member.name: T:Flame.Syntax.EmptyDocumentationParser
member.summary: A documentation parser that does not really parse anything: it always returns an empty sequence.

member.name: M:Flame.Syntax.EmptyDocumentationParser.Parse(System.String,Flame.Compiler.SourceLocation,Flame.Compiler.ICompilerLog)
member.summary: Parses the given textual documentation into description attributes.

member.name: P:Flame.Syntax.ISyntaxAssembly.RootNamespace
member.summary: Gets the nameless root namespace of the assembly.

member.name: T:Flame.Syntax.ISourceSyntax
member.summary: A syntax node that tracks it location in source code.
